verbs.description: [ARG0: Lawrence O’Donnell] [ARGM-TMP: on Monday] [V: accused] [ARG1: congressional Republicans] [ARG2: of nothing more than political theater in their responses to the FBI text scandal] . He treated the texts as a sideshow , and he attempted to present Republicans as hypocrites by comparing their criticisms of the FBI at a congressional hearing to their own criticisms of Donald Trump .
